channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Opera’s Air Browser Is Here to Make Your Internet Experience Less Stressful
item.description: Stay well on the web with Opera Air, a browser that plays soothing ambient music and encourages you to take breaks.

item.title: President Trump’s War on ‘Information Silos’ Is Bad News for Your Personal Data
item.description: Donald Trump’s March 20 executive order aims to eliminate data silos. It could undermine privacy in the process.

item.title: TechCrunch All Stage: Learn how AI can supercharge your MVPs with Chris Gardner
item.description: TechCrunch All Stage, our big event for founders of startups at all stages of funding (see what we did there?), is coming up July 15 at Boston’s SoWa ...

item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2024.

item.title: OpenAI says it’ll release o3 after all, delays GPT-5
item.description: After effectively cancelling the consumer launch of its o3 reasoning model in February, OpenAI now says it aims to release both o3 and a next-gen succ...

item.title: Trump fires head of National Security Agency and Cyber Command
item.description: Haugh’s firing has seemingly caught senior lawmakers by surprise

item.title: Automakers jump on Tesla’s brand woes with discount EV offers
item.description: Tesla trade-ins in the U.S. are at an all time high as some owners become disillusioned with Elon Musk’s politics, and some just want to avoid their c...

item.title: 9 Best Protein Powders of 2025, Tested & Reviewed by WIRED
item.description: We found the best protein powders that won't make your shake taste like drywall.

item.title: HMD OffGrid Satellite Communicator Review: Fits in Your Pocket
item.description: If you love the backcountry, this tiny, tough, and relatively affordable satellite communicator can give you peace of mind.

item.title: What Is the Meta AI Button in WhatsApp, and How Do I Remove It?
item.description: Meta’s in-app chatbot add-on is rolling out in more countries. Here’s what you need to know, including how to get rid of it.
